project.description: THIS IS THE STARTING POINT FOR A MANUAL BUILD OF THE RESEARCH PDF APPLICATION

secureScript.script:
def opendiv = "
" def checkbox = "" def desc = "Prints out would be calls to other jobs, but do not go through with them." def closediv = "
" return opendiv + checkbox + desc + closediv

def opendiv = "
" def checkbox = "" def desc = "If checked log output will be verbose." def closediv = "
" return opendiv + checkbox + desc + closediv

def picklist = new StringBuilder("") def opendiv = "
" def desc = "  What landscape is the target EC2 instance(s) in?" def closediv = "
" return opendiv + picklist.toString() + desc + closediv

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;font-family:monospace' disabled=true>"

secureScript.script:
def opendiv = "
" def checkbox = "" def desc = "Put a new kualico research-pdf docker image into our ECR repository" def closediv = "
" return opendiv + checkbox + desc + closediv

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' readonly=true name='value' value='error' style='width:400px; font-family:monospace;' disabled=true>"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ "$(echo $VERBOSE | sed 's/,//g')" == false ] && set +x
# Static and private variables CLI=/var/lib/jenkins/jenkins-cli.jar HOST=http://localhost:8080/ EC2_IDS=() CMDS=()
# Fix the trailing comma issue with active choices parameters reactive DEBUG="$(echo $DEBUG | sed 's/,//g')" LANDSCAPE="$(echo $LANDSCAPE | sed 's/,//g')" DOCKER_IMAGES="$(echo $DOCKER_IMAGES | sed 's/,//g')" # The two "parts" were separated with a space character parts=($DOCKER_IMAGES) BU_VERSION=${parts[0]} KUALICO_IMAGE=${parts[1]}
if [ -n "$KUALICO_IMAGE" ] ; then echo "BU_VERSION = $BU_VERSION" echo "KUALICO_IMAGE = $KUALICO_IMAGE" echo "RESUME NEXT: Call kuali-pdf-1-update-docker-image" else echo "BU_VERSION = $BU_VERSION" echo "No docker image update" fi exit 0
source /var/lib/jenkins/cli-credentials.sh case "$LANDSCAPE" in "sb") EC2_IDS=("i-099de1c5407493f9b" "i-0c2d2ef87e98f2088");; "ci") BRANCH="bu-master" EC2_IDS=("i-0258a5f2a87ba7972" "i-0511b83a249cd9fb1");; "qa") EC2_IDS=("i-011ccd29dec6c6d10");; "stg") EC2_IDS=("i-090d188ea237c8bcf" "i-0cb479180574b4ba2");; "prod") EC2_IDS=("i-0534c4e38e6a24009" "i-07d7b5f3e629e89ae");; esac
for i in $(seq ${#EC2_IDS[@]}); do CMD="java -jar ${CLI} -s ${HOST} build 'kuali-pdf-2-run-docker-container' -v -f \ -p VERBOSE=${VERBOSE} \ -p BLAST_IMAGE=true \ -p GIT_BRANCH=master \ -p GIT_REPO_URL=git@github.com:bu-ist/kuali-research-docker.git \ -p LANDSCAPE=${LANDSCAPE} \ -p EC2_INSTANCE_ID=${EC2_IDS[i-1]}" CMDS[${#CMDS[@]}]=$CMD done;
for ((i = 0; i < ${#CMDS[@]}; i++)) ; do CMD_PRINTABLE="$(echo "${CMDS[i]}" | sed 's/[[:space:]][[:space:]]*\-p/\n\0/g')" printf "\n$CMD_PRINTABLE\n" [ "$DEBUG" == false ] && eval "${CMDS[i]}" done
printf "\n\nBuild Completed!"
